query: SHOW CREATE TABLE cms_pages; SHOW CREATE TABLE cms_page_sections;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user cYPAHDVF1MZtM6S.6044338ada58 --database cwh3JmcrqYgAZTUAinEMzM --execute SHOW CREATE TABLE cms_pages; SHOW CREATE TABLE cms_page_sections;
messages: `status` enum('draft','published','archived') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'draft',
`updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
`updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
CONSTRAINT `fk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`pageId`) REFERENCES `cwh3JmcrqYgAZTUAinEMzM`.`cms_pages` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE
stdout:
Table	Create Table
cms_pages	CREATE TABLE `cms_pages` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `title` varchar(200) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `slug` varchar(200) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `description` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `pageType` enum('landing','sales','content','legal','custom') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'landing',
  `status` enum('draft','published','archived') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'draft',
  `metaTitle` varchar(200) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `metaDescription` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `ogImage` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `showHeader` tinyint(1) DEFAULT '1',
  `showFooter` tinyint(1) DEFAULT '1',
  `customCss` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `createdBy` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `publishedAt` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */,
  UNIQUE KEY `slug` (`slug`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci AUTO_INCREMENT=60001
Table	Create Table
cms_page_sections	CREATE TABLE `cms_page_sections` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `pageId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `sectionType` enum('hero','text_block','cta','features','testimonials','pricing_table','faq','image_gallery','video','stats','team','contact_form','newsletter','custom_html','divider','spacer') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `title` varchar(300) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `subtitle` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `content` json DEFAULT NULL,
  `backgroundColor` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `textColor` varchar(20) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `paddingTop` int(11) DEFAULT '48',
  `paddingBottom` int(11) DEFAULT '48',
  `sortOrder` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `isVisible` tinyint(1) DEFAULT '1',
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */,
  KEY `fk_1` (`pageId`),
  CONSTRAINT `fk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`pageId`) REFERENCES `cwh3JmcrqYgAZTUAinEMzM`.`cms_pages` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci AUTO_INCREMENT=30001
